test-case.name: fn-substring-after-1
test-case.description: Evaluates The "substring-after" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "" $arg2 = ""

test-case.name: fn-substring-after-2
test-case.description: Evaluates The "substring-after" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "" $arg2 = "A Character String"

test-case.name: fn-substring-after-3
test-case.description: Evaluates The "substring-after" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "" $arg2 = "A Character String"

test-case.name: fn-substring-after-4
test-case.description: Evaluates The "substring-after" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = () $arg2 = ""

test-case.name: fn-substring-after-5
test-case.description: Evaluates The "substring-after" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "" $arg2 = ()

test-case.name: fn-substring-after-6
test-case.description: Evaluates The "substring-after" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "A Character String" $arg2 = ()

test-case.name: fn-substring-after-7
test-case.description: Evaluates The "substring-after" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = () $arg2 = "A Character String"

test-case.name: fn-substring-after-8
test-case.description: Evaluates The "substring-after" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "AAAAABBBBBCCCCC" $arg2 = "BBBBB"

test-case.name: fn-substring-after-9
test-case.description: Evaluates The "substring-after" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "AAAAABBBBB" $arg2 = " "

test-case.name: fn-substring-after-10
test-case.description: Evaluates The "substring-after" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = " " $arg2 = " AAAAABBBBB"

test-case.name: fn-substring-after-11
test-case.description: Evaluates The "substring-after" function using it as a argument of a fn:not - returns true

test-case.name: fn-substring-after-12
test-case.description: Evaluates The "substring-after" function using it as a argument of a fn:not - returns true

test-case.name: fn-substring-after-13
test-case.description: Evaluates The "substring-after" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = xs:string("A") $arg2 = "A"

test-case.name: fn-substring-after-14
test-case.description: Evaluates The "substring-after" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "A" $arg2 = xs:string("A")

test-case.name: fn-substring-after-15
test-case.description: Evaluates The "substring-after" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "A" $arg2 = "a"

test-case.name: fn-substring-after-16
test-case.description: Evaluates The "substring-after" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "a" $arg2 = "A"

test-case.name: fn-substring-after-17
test-case.description: Evaluates The "substring-after" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "substring-after" $arg2 = "substring-after"

test-case.name: fn-substring-after-18
test-case.description: Evaluates The "substring-after" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "substring-aftersubstring-after" $arg2 = "substring-after"

test-case.name: fn-substring-after-19
test-case.description: Evaluates The "substring-after" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "****" $arg2 = "***"

test-case.name: fn-substring-after-20
test-case.description: Evaluates The "substring-after" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "12345" $arg2 = "1234"

test-case.name: fn-substring-after-21
test-case.description: Evaluates The "substring-after" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "substring-after $arg2 = "refta-gnirtsbus ("substring-after" backwards)

test-case.name: K-SubstringAfterFunc-1
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `substring-after()`.

test-case.name: K-SubstringAfterFunc-2
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `substring-after(())`.

test-case.name: K-SubstringAfterFunc-3
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `substring-after((), (), "http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-functions/collation/codepoint", "wrong param")`.

test-case.name: K-SubstringAfterFunc-4
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `substring-after("a string", "a string", "http://www.example.com/COLLATION/NOT/SUPPORTED")`.

test-case.name: K-SubstringAfterFunc-5
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `substring-after("foo", "fo", "http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-functions/collation/codepoint") eq "o"`.

test-case.name: K-SubstringAfterFunc-6
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `substring-after("tattoo", "tat") eq "too"`.

test-case.name: K-SubstringAfterFunc-7
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `substring-after("tattoo", "tattoo") eq ""`.

test-case.name: K-SubstringAfterFunc-8
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `substring-after("abcdefgedij", "def") eq "gedij"`.

test-case.name: K-SubstringAfterFunc-9
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `substring-after((), ()) eq ""`.

test-case.name: K-SubstringAfterFunc-10
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `substring-after("a string", ()) eq "a string"`.

test-case.name: K-SubstringAfterFunc-11
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `substring-after("a string", "not in other") eq ""`.

test-case.name: cbcl-substring-after-001
test-case.description: test fn:substring-after with collation and empty string
